output:
Midnight Sun
Take me to the darkness inside your heart
Let me heal you, we need a fresh start
Your soul was broken, I was alive
We will be together, let me remind
I just used to hate you
What has changed you? What I've done wrong?
Let me take you to the place you belong
Your mind was crushed, I was alive
We will be together, let me remind
I just used to hate you
